com.identos.android.id100.library.ccid

Class CcidReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.identos.android.id100.library.ccid.CcidReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.os.Parcelable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    UsbReader

    public abstract class CcidReader
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.os.Parcelable
    This interface provides the basic methods to implement a CCID reader.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface android.os.Parcelable

                throws java.io.IOException
        Connects to the card inserted in the reader using a specified card protocol.
        Parameters:
        protocol - the card protocol to be used.
        Returns:
        the ATR (Answer To Reset) of the card
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the connection failed

        Parameters:

        the event
        Throws:

      • waitForCardEvent

        public int waitForCardEvent(int event,
                            long timeout)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Waits for an card event synchronously with a timeout.
        Parameters:
        event - the event to be waited for
        timeout - the timeout to be waited in ms
        Returns:
        the event
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if waiting for the event failed or the timeout occurred.
